Audit.Message:
⚠️ TEST AUDIT FINDINGS:
- Total Test Files: 362 (185 unit, 177 integration)
- Potential Test Cases: 3185 (by counting It blocks)
- Actually Run: 5478 (172% of potential)
- Test Results: Passed=1104, Failed=4038, Skipped=336

The autogenerated test system has created 362 test files with approximately 3185 test cases.
Test results are aggregated from TestReport-*.json files in library/tests/results.
Run './automation-scripts/0402_Run-UnitTests.ps1' (unit) or './automation-scripts/0403_Run-IntegrationTests.ps1' (integration) to execute tests.
